mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At ATP Store, we are committed to providing exceptional products and services that help businesses thrive. Our mission is to be the most trusted partner for companies seeking quality, reliability, and innovation in their supply chain solutions.
mission.paragraph2: With decades of experience and a deep understanding of various industries, we have built strong relationships with leading manufacturers and suppliers worldwide. This enables us to offer competitive prices, fast delivery, and unmatched customer service.

history.title: Our History
paragraphs: Founded in 2011 with humble beginnings in Malmö, Alfe Tissue Paper has embarked on an extraordinary journey that has now led us to establish our headquarters in the vibrant city of Lund. As a company deeply committed to excellence and customer satisfaction, we take pride in offering tailored solutions that cater to the unique needs of our valued customers. Our success can be attributed to our extensive network, extending both within our home country and beyond its borders, enabling us to provide exceptional service both nationally and internationally.

At the heart of our operations lies our expertise in the packaging industry. With a fleet of dedicated vehicles, we offer delivery services to our valued customers in Skåne. Our mission is simple yet deeply heartfelt - to provide high-quality service with unwavering commitment. Through regular visits to our customers, at least once a week, we strive to ensure that our offerings meet their requirements and exceed their expectations.

In Skåne, we primarily focus on two essential categories: food packaging and hygiene paper. Our dedication to ensuring the safe delivery of essential goods to various establishments sets us apart in the industry. We take great satisfaction in serving hotels where convenience and practicality are of paramount importance, as well as restaurants where presentation and preservation are crucial factors.

Furthermore, we offer our services to charming cafes that have become an integral part of Skåne's social fabric, where packaging quality complements the delights they serve. Our offerings are also tailored for professional catering services, where efficiency and reliability are essential for a seamless experience. Let's not forget the lively bakeries, where packaging freshness and hygiene are crucial to preserving the delicious flavors.

Our commitment does not end in Skåne; it forms the foundation for our future endeavors. Our vision is rooted in positive growth and unwavering profitability. We aspire to expand our horizons and reach to make our exceptional products readily accessible to customers across Sweden. As we embark on this ambitious journey, we remain true to our core values of integrity, customer-centricity, and innovation.
